definitions: To recall to the mind; to have an image or idea of (something) in the mind.
To retain in the memory; to not forget.
To keep in mind and mention or consider.
To give a gift or tip to (someone).
To make a mental note of something to be done or considered later.
examples: Please remember to close the door.
He always remembers his staff at Christmas.
I need to remember to buy milk.
